#include<stdio.h>
int sum(int n)
{
    int rem,k,sm;
    k=n;
    sm=0;
    while(k!=0)
    {
        rem=k%10;
        sm+=rem;
        k/=10;
    }
    return n+sm;
}
int main()
{
    int i,e,k,t,n;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        e=0;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        i=1;
        while(sum(i)!=n&&i<=n)
        {
            if(i==n)
            {
             e=1;
             break;
            }
            i++;
        }
        if(e==0)
        {
            printf("%d\n",i);
        }
        else
            printf("NONE\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
